analysis.headline: Shares Your Data with AI
analysis.quote: Polirizer utilizes cutting-edge AI models, including GPT-4o-mini and Claude, to analyze and summarize privacy policies.

analysis.headline: Your Content May Train AI
analysis.quote: Polirizer utilizes cutting-edge AI models, including GPT-4o-mini and Claude, to analyze and summarize privacy policies.

analysis.headline: Uses Your Browser Fingerprint
analysis.quote: The extension uses privacy-preserving fingerprinting technology to maintain user sessions and provide a seamless experience while protecting user privacy.

analysis.headline: Collects Your Activity & Content
analysis.quote: Polirizer - Privacy Policy Summarizer handles the following: User activity, Website content

analysis.headline: You Manage AI API Keys
analysis.quote: Users can easily manage their API keys and settings through a dedicated modal interface.
